name: Patchwork
descriptions: Patchwork, or "Patches," is a ghoul who resides in the city of Underworld in Fallout 3.
Patchwork is the resident drunk of Underworld, drinking to a point where he consistently slurs his words and has a tendency to forget what is being said to him mid-conversation.
He is in a poor physical state and is prone to losing body parts that Doctor Barrows has to both locate and subsequently sew back on, almost like a "patchwork."

Patchwork can be heard singing "Bugger off, ye bastards bugger off... ye'll get nae more this evenin'" which is the beginning of the Irish drinking song 'Bugger Off,' though he forgets the remaining lyrics.

Patchwork randomly wanders around the promenade inside the center area of Underworld. He may enter The Ninth Circle to obtain more alcohol. He and Quinn appear to be good friends, as in a non-player character to non-player character conversation Patchwork asks Quinn if he "brought anything back" for him.
Patchwork will tell you to "talk to Ahzrukhal" even if Ahzrukhal is already dead.

topics.response_text: ... ... huh? ... Ah! Jesus Christ! Don't... don't sneak up on me like that, the last fella... the last fella to do that damn near lost my arm.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, pal. I can't spare the caps either.
topics.response_text: You're as cheap as the rest of them.

topics.topic: MS14BribeOh look! I dropped these 50 caps in your pocket...
topics.topic_text: How about a whole bottle? Here's 10 caps.
topics.response_text: A whole bottle? You got a deal. All I know is that he keeps trying to hire outsiders to do some killing.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: Won't never buy me a drink, that's what.{drunk}

topics.topic: MS14PersuadeCrowleyCome on. You can tell me. Ahzrukhal said so. <Lie.>
topics.topic_text: Here's 3 caps for a drink, but you've got to tell me what you know.
topics.response_text: Deal. All I know is that he keeps trying to hire outsiders to do some killing.
Oh, no! You're just trying to get me in trouble. And drunk.

topics.topic_text: Where can I get a drink around here? You seem like the right person to ask.
topics.response_text: Why, you'll want to head on over to the Ninth Circle and talk to Mister Ahzrukhal... he... he... uhhh... what was I saying?

topics.topic_text: So, you're the town drunk, huh?
topics.response_text: Why yes! Yes I am! And... PROUD! Proud of it! I mean, if I weren't, I'd probably just spend a lot more time cry... crying... you know?

topics.topic_text: You're losing parts? Like... body parts?
topics.response_text: Yeah... it happens... a lot, actuall.. actually. All the time. But I'm getting' better... I think...
Really? You... you're alright... you should buy me a drink some time...

topics.topic_text: Watch out for your own body parts, you creepy bastard.
topics.response_text: Now... there's no need for tha... that... wait... what were you saying? You wanted to talk to me... about something? What was it?

topics.topic_text: You keep your parts to yourself and let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Well... what... what... do you want to talk about?
Who, me? Yeah... yeah... I'm fine. I guess. No... Yeah. I'll be okay. I just... I just need to try not to lose any of my parts this time...

topics.topic_text: You be careful. I don't want you hurting yourself.
topics.response_text: You sure? Some... some people make me hurt myself... because it makes 'em laugh...
Yeah... and I ain't had enough liqu- liquor yet to think you.. you're pretty.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Underworld?
topics.response_text: What can YOU tell ME about... wait... what?

conversation.response_text: Too bad about Crowley. I heard Tenpenny put out a contract on him.
Huh? Oh! Hey Winthrop! How're... how're you? I didn't see- see you there! What's up?
Oh... I get it! Ha! Like my name, right? Good 'ol... good ol' Patchwork, always leaving hit bits around town...
Oh, okay. Maybe.. maybe we can get a drink after you're done working!
That ain't what ... I asked you, stupid... stupid robot.
